BatchCalcJobDefinition.description: Populate and maintain publicly searchable school data.

filters.description: Filters the business profile records that are publicly searchable.
filters.label: MN01 - Filter Publicly Searchable Business Profiles
filters.name: MN01_Filter_Publicly_Searchable_Business_Profiles

filters.description: Filters educational institution offerings that are publicly searchable and active.
filters.label: MN03 - Filter Active and Publicly Searchable Educational Institution Offerings
filters.name: MN03_Filter_Active_and_Publicly_Searchable_Educational_Institution_Offerings

filters.description: Filters learning programs that are active.
filters.label: MN05 - Filter Active Learning Programs
filters.name: MN05_Filter_Active_Learning_Programs

filters.description: Filters records where a matching educational institution searchable profile record isn't found.
filters.label: MN16 - Filter Inserted Records
filters.name: MN16_Filter_Inserted_Records

filters.description: Filters data to include only records that have existing profile data and potential updates to that profile data.
filters.label: MN17 - Filter Updated Records
filters.name: MN17_Filter_Updated_Records

filters.description: Filters data to include only records that have existing profile data but donâ€™t have matching source data or the source data is no longer eligible to be part of the searchable profile.
filters.label: MN18 - Filter Deleted Records
filters.name: MN18_Filter_Deleted_Records

joins.description: Joins publicly searchable business profile records with their related account information.
joins.label: MN02 - Join Publicly Searchable Business Profile with Account
joins.name: MN02_Join_Publicly_Searchable_Business_Profile_with_Account

joins.description: Adds the school or campus information related to the learning program.
joins.label: MN04 - Add School Campus Information
joins.name: MN04_Add_School_Campus_Information

joins.description: Joins eligible educational institution offering records with their related learning programs.
joins.label: MN06 - Join Educational Institution Offering with Learning Program
joins.name: MN06_Join_Educational_Institution_Offering_with_Learning_Program

joins.description: Adds account name related to the department of the learning program in the provider account.
joins.label: MN08 - Add Account to Provider Account
joins.name: MN08_Add_Account_to_Provider_Account

joins.description: Joins eligible educational institution offering records with their support programs.
joins.label: MN10 - Join Educational Institution Offering with Program
joins.name: MN10_Join_Educational_Institution_Offering_with_Program

joins.description: Finds the learning program or support program related to the existing educational institution searchable profile and determines which records to insert, update, and delete.
joins.label: MN15 - Join Learning and Support Program with Educ Inst Searchable Profile
joins.name: MN15_Join_Learning_and_Support_Program_with_Educ_Inst_Searchable_Profile

transforms.description: Identifies a composite ID by using key elements to filter out duplicate source records, and to merge with target records.
transforms.label: MN12 - Identify Composite ID for Source Data
transforms.name: MN12_Identify_Composite_Id_for_Source_Data

transforms.description: Identifies a composite ID by using key elements on Educational Institution Searchable Profile to merge with source records.
transforms.label: MN13 - Compute Composite Id for Educational Institution Searchable Profile
transforms.name: MN13_Compute_Composite_Id_for_Educational_Institution_Searchable_Profile

transforms.description: Transforms the learning program fields and support program fields into the format required for criteria-based searching and filtering.
transforms.label: MN14 - Transform Learning Program and Support Program Information
transforms.name: MN14_Transform_Learning_Program_and_Support_Program_Information

writebacks.description: Inserts eligible educational institution searchable profile records.
writebacks.label: MNF01 - Insert Educational Institution Searchable Profile Records
writebacks.name: MNF01_Insert_Educational_Institution_Searchable_Profile_Records

writebacks.description: Updates eligible educational institution searchable profile records with the latest changes. Records that havenâ€™t changed are skipped.
writebacks.label: MNF02 - Update Educational Institution Searchable Profile Records
writebacks.name: MNF02_Update_Educational_Institution_Searchable_Profile_Records

writebacks.description: Deletes educational institution searchable profile records that should no longer be available for public search.
